body.p: Some respondents to ED 8 expressed concern that entities were to be allowed not to give entity‑wide disclosures about products and services and geographical areas if ‘… the necessary information is not available and the cost to develop it would be excessive.’ They argued that the test to be applied for non‑disclosure should be that of impracticability as defined in IAS 1 Presentation of Financial Statements.
